sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong pelan-pelan, saya sedang sakit.
english translation: "Slowly please, I am sick."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong! Ada kereta mau menabrak.
english translation: "Help! There's a train about to hit."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka makan sandwich dengan tomat.
english translation: "I like to eat sandwich with tomato."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong buang sampah di tong sampah, bukan di lantai.
english translation: "Please throw the trash in the trash can, not on the floor."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aduh, ada tonggeret di dapur!
english translation: "Oops, there's a cockroach in the kitchen!"

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pakai jaket tebal kalau mau keluar, nanti ada topan.
english translation: "Wear a thick jacket if you're going out, there might be a typhoon."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Topi kamu cocok banget sama baju ini.
english translation: "Your hat matches this outfit perfectly."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tornado merusak rumah-rumah di sekitar.
english translation: "The tornado damaged houses around it."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya ingin pergi ke Toronto, Canada suatu saat.
english translation: "I want to go to Toronto, Canada someday."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya dulu senang bermain track and field waktu di sekolah.
english translation: "I used to enjoy playing track and field when I was in school."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Trem nya sudah lebih dari 30 menit telat.
english translation: "The tram is already more than 30 minutes late."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Trenggiling adalah hewan yang langka dan dilindungi.
english translation: "Pangolin is a rare and protected animal."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong bantu saya tolak troli ini keluar dari mall.
english translation: "Please help me push this cart out of the mall."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka suara trombon dalam orkestra.
english translation: "I like the sound of the trombone in the orchestra."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak saya ingin belajar main trompet di band sekolah.
english translation: "My child wants to learn how to play the trumpet in school band."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Di Jakarta, banyak trotoar yang rusak dan sulit untuk dilewati.
english translation: "In Jakarta, many sidewalks are damaged and difficult to pass through."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Truk itu memuat berbagai macam barang.
english translation: "That truck carries various kinds of goods."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tsunami telah menimbulkan banyak kerusakan di Jepang.
english translation: "The tsunami has caused a lot of damage in Japan."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya masih belum membayar sewa bulan ini, belum bicara dengan tuan tanah.
english translation: "I haven't paid rent this month, haven't talked to the landlord yet."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kita harus merawat tubuh kita dengan baik.
english translation: "We have to take good care of our body."
